Utils¶

This package provides core and general purpose utility code for eo4vistrails. In particular, provides a generic session object for connecting to cloud environments, GIS environments and statistical environments.

DataRequest¶

This module forms part of the eo4vistrails capabilities - it is used to handle data and PostGIS requests for processing inside vistrails.

DropDownListWidget¶

TODO Add documentation to this module.

class utils.DropDownListWidget.ComboBoxWidget(param, parent=None)¶

Subclass this class to make your own combobox widget with its own list by setting the value of _KEY_VALUES or by redefing getKeyValues().

NOTE: keys must be strings in the dict

ThreadSafe¶

This module is used to add threading ability to VisTrails.

This is the core module holding annotations and mixins,

update()¶

update() -> None Check if the module is up-to-date then update the modules. Report to the logger if available.

class utils.ThreadSafe.ThreadTestModule¶

This Test Module is to check that ThreadSafe is working and also provides a template for others to use ThreadSafe

WebRequest¶

This module forms part of the eo4vistrails capabilities - it is used to handle web request (e.g. for WFS, WCS or SOS) processing inside vistrails.

class utils.WebRequest.WebRequest(url=None, data=None, runTheRequest=False, timeout=60)¶

This module will process a web-based request.

  • With only the ‘urls’ port set, the module will execute a GET request.
  • With the ‘data’ port set as well, the module will execute a POST request.
compute()¶

Execute the module to create the output

get_layername()¶

Overwrite method in DataRequest

get_uri()¶

Overwrite method in DataRequest

requestType()¶

Determine the request type - return GET or POST

runRequest()¶

Execute an HTTP POST request for a given URL and data
